Metadata.name: Signature Skills+ - Oratorio (Messiah)
Metadata.author: rudiger__gb
Metadata.description:
Requires and must be placed ABOVE the "Compendium Restoration Pack" in Aemulus Package Manager!
Allows Messiah to learn the signature skill "Oratorio" at level 81 (innate).
Fully restore party's HP and negate all debuffs. (Mediarahan + Dekunda).
Cost: 38 SP
